paper_abstract: This paper is concerned with the existence of positive solutions of boundary value problem for p-Laplacian impulsive dynamic equations on time scales. Existence results of at least three positive solutions are established via a new fixed point theorem in a cone. (c) 2007 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Triple positive solutions of boundary value problems for p-Laplacian impulsive dynamic equations on time scales
